question.qText: Place the following gases in order of increasing velocity at 0°C: He, O<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, N<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, CO<font face='SubScript'>2</font>.

aBtn.aText: He, O<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, N<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, CO<font face='SubScript'>2</font>
CO<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, O<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, N<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, He
He, N<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, O<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, CO<font face='SubScript'>2</font>
CO<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, N<font face='SubScript'>2</font>, He, O<font face='SubScript'>2</font>
